Typealiases.html#/s:7Lotsawa11DotPositio.name: DotPosition
Typealiases.html#/s:7Lotsawa11DotPositio.abstract: A position on the RHS of a grammar rule.

Typealiases.html#/s:7Lotsawa14DefaultGra.name: DefaultGrammar
Typealiases.html#/s:7Lotsawa14DefaultGra.abstract: A grammar type that represent just about any logical grammar, but may waste

Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.name: chart
Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.abstract: Storage for all DerivationGroups, grouped by Earleme and sorted within each Earleme.

Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.name: initialize()
Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.abstract: Prepares self to recognize an input of length n.

Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.name: currentEarleme
Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.abstract: The index of the Earley set currently being worked on.

Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.name: discover(_:startingAt:)
Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.abstract: Respond to the discovery of s starting at origin and ending in the current earleme.

Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.name: finishEarleme()
Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.abstract: Completes the current earleme and moves on to the next one, returning true unless no

Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.name: hasCompleteParse()
Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.abstract: Returns true iff there is at least one complete parse of the input through the last finished

Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.name: forest
Structs/Recognizer.html#/s:7Lotsawa10Rec.abstract: Returns a representation of everything recognized so far.

Structs/PreprocessedGrammar.html#/s:7Lot.name: init(_:)
Structs/PreprocessedGrammar.html#/s:7Lot.abstract: Creates a preprocessed version of raw, ready for recognition.

Structs/Grammar/Rule.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Gr.name: RHS
Structs/Grammar/Rule.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Gr.abstract: The sequence of symbols whose recognition implies the

Structs/Grammar/Rule.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Gr.name: rhs
Structs/Grammar/Rule.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Gr.abstract: The sequence of symbols that imply to recognition of the lhs.

Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.name: init(recognizing:)
Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.abstract: Creates an empty instance intended (when rules have been added) to recognize startSymbol.

Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.name: Size
Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.abstract: A representation of the size of the grammar (the total length of all right-hand sides

Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.name: Position
Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.abstract: A location in the grammar; e.g. the position of a dot in a partially-recognized rule.

Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.name: size
Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.abstract: Returns the size of self (the sum of the lengths of each rule’s RHS and LHS).

Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.name: rules
Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.abstract: The collection of all rules in the grammar.

Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.name: rule(containing:)
Structs/Grammar.html#/s:7Lotsawa7Grammar.abstract: Returns the ID of the rule containing p.

Structs/RuleID.html#/s:7Lotsawa6RuleIDV1.abstract: Returns true iff l must precede r in a sort based on ordinal.

Structs/Symbol.html#/s:7Lotsawa6SymbolV1.abstract: Returns true iff l must precede r in a sort based on id.

Structs/Forest/Derivation.html#/s:7Lotsa.name: rhs
Structs/Forest/Derivation.html#/s:7Lotsa.abstract: The RHS symbols of the rule by which lhs was derived.

Structs/Forest/Derivation.html#/s:7Lotsa.name: rhsOrigins
Structs/Forest/Derivation.html#/s:7Lotsa.abstract: The position in the source where each RHS symbol of this derivation starts.

Structs/Forest/DerivationSet.html.name: DerivationSet
Structs/Forest/DerivationSet.html.abstract: A subset of the parses of a single symbol over a range of source positions.

Structs/Forest/Derivation.html.name: Derivation
Structs/Forest/Derivation.html.abstract: One parse of a single symbol over a range of source positions, each of whose constituent RHS

Structs/Forest.html#/s:7Lotsawa6ForestV1.name: requireCompletion(_:inEarleme:)
Structs/Forest.html#/s:7Lotsawa6ForestV1.abstract: Injects c into leoCompletions unless it is already represented in the compound chart,

Structs/Forest.html#/s:7Lotsawa6ForestV2.name: collectLeoCompletions(causing:endingAt:)
Structs/Forest.html#/s:7Lotsawa6ForestV2.abstract: Ensures there is a record in leoCompletions of all completions omitted by Leo optimization

Structs/Forest.html#/s:7Lotsawa6ForestV1.name: derivations(of:over:)
Structs/Forest.html#/s:7Lotsawa6ForestV1.abstract: Returns the set representing all derivations of lhs over locus.

Structs/Chart/Entry.html#/s:7Lotsawa5Cha.abstract: Returns true iff lhs should precede rhs in a derivation set.

Structs/Chart.html#/s:7Lotsawa5ChartV9ea.name: earleySet(_:)
Structs/Chart.html#/s:7Lotsawa5ChartV9ea.abstract: The set of partial parses ending at earleme i.

Structs/Chart/Entry.html.name: Entry
Structs/Chart/Entry.html.abstract: A Leo or Earley item bundled with a single mainstem cause.

Structs/Chart.html.name: Chart
Structs/Chart.html.abstract: Storage for incremental recognition results and the core representation of a parse forest.

Structs/Forest.html.name: Forest
Structs/Forest.html.abstract: A result of recognition from which parses can be extracted.

Structs/Symbol.html.name: Symbol
Structs/Symbol.html.abstract: A symbol in the grammar with a 14-bit ID.

Structs/Grammar.html.name: Grammar
Structs/Grammar.html.abstract: A collection of Backus-Naur Form (BNF) rules, each defining a symbol

Structs/Recognizer.html.name: Recognizer
Structs/Recognizer.html.abstract: A process that creates the parse forest for a token stream with respect to a Grammar.

Extensions/BidirectionalCollection.html#.name: suffix(while:)
Extensions/BidirectionalCollection.html#.abstract: Returns the longest suffix of self s.t. all elements satisfy predicate

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
